TopicTitle: Time Acceleration Receptacle and Sundry Snack Dispenser (KSP TARDIS)

Articles.Content:
The Time Acceleration Receptacle and Sundry Snack Dispenser

AKA The TARASSD

For when you don't feel like waiting out a transfer window in your rocket, the TARASSD is there to keep your rockets safe and dry in the VAB instead of getting rained/snowed on on the launchpad.

Launch vehicle not included, Kerbal scientists couldn't figure out how to fit the propulsion system and the time-acceleration system in without making the inside larger than the outside.

Download here.
Awesome! Now put a Kraken drive in it.

Need a mod to able it make space/time jumps.

And the interior can be the big ship size. Only need the 3D model and textures...

Great!
Oh noes! I made a Dalek a week ago that can shoot!
